siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.html:
The Free plan allows you to view up to 12 hours of logs. Paid plans allows up to 2 weeks of logs. While in the single server view, click on “Showing 1 hour”, which is in the middle of the screen in front of all charts and text boxes, then select from the dropdown how many hours you want to see at once in the charts.

The optional values are 1, 3, 6, 12 or 24 hours. To navigate through time click the left and right arrows around this selection.

frontmatter.title: How to view more than 1 hour of logs?
Do I need a credit card to register?
